name: Under Your Skin
flavor_text: The splinter you just can't remove.

frame.name: Precision Frame
frame.description:
Compound Bow. Longer draw time optimized for damage. 
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

perks.description:
Durable yet light bowstring.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Agile Bowstring

perks.description:
Stable, high-friction bowstring.
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Tactile String

perks.description:
Excellent snapback.
  •  Decreases accuracy
  •  Faster draw time
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Elastic String

perks.description:
Light and easy to draw.
  •  Slightly faster draw time
  •  Slightly decreases accuracy
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Flexible String

perks.description:
Tightly strung bow.
  •  Greatly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly slower draw time
  •  Slightly decreases stability
perks.name: High Tension String

perks.description:
Simple balanced string.
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Natural String

perks.description:
Unbreakable bowstring.
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly faster draw time
perks.name: Polymer String

perks.description:
Light and stable shaft material. 
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Carbon Arrow Shaft

perks.description:
Thinner arrows to increase nocking speed and weapon handling.
  •  Increases handling speed 
  •  Increases reload speed
perks.name: Compact Arrow Shaft

perks.description:
Heavy and consistent. 
  •  Greatly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly decreases stability
perks.name: Fiberglass Arrow Shaft

perks.description:
Aerodynamic and light. 
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Helical Fletching

perks.description:
Feather-light with good control.
  •  Slightly decreases accuracy
  •  Greatly increases stability
perks.name: Natural Fletching

perks.description:
Modern fletching for straight paths. 
  •  Increases accuracy
perks.name: Straight Fletching

perks.description: Increased accuracy, stability, and handling when firing while crouched.
perks.name: Firmly Planted

perks.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one kill.
perks.name: Unrelenting

perks.description: Increases accuracy, stability, and precision hit targeting when firing from the hip.
perks.name: Hip-Fire Grip

perks.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one target. Improves handling.
perks.name: Unrelenting

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus stability, handling, and reload speed while the wielder is in motion.
perks.name: Perpetual Motion

perks.description: Reloading after defeating a target greatly increases target acquisition and aim down sight speed for a short duration.
perks.name: Tunnel Vision

perks.description: Draw time decreases after every precision hit.
perks.name: Archer's Tempo

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus stability, handling, and reload speed while the wielder is in motion for a short duration.
perks.name: Perpetual Motion Enhanced

perks.description: Reloading after defeating a target greatly increases target acquisition and aim down sight speed for an improved duration.
perks.name: Tunnel Vision

perks.description: Draw time substantially decreases after every precision hit for a longer duration.
perks.name: Archer's Tempo

perks.description: Using this weapon to break the shield of a combatant or a Guardian using their Super will grant you an overshield.
perks.name: Turnabout

perks.description: Arrows explode after a short delay.
perks.name: Explosive Head

perks.description: Improved accuracy and range on the opening shot of attack.
perks.name: Opening Shot

perks.description: Using this weapon to break the shield of a combatant or a Guardian using their Super will grant you an overshield for an improved duration.
perks.name: Turnabout

perks.description: Arrows explode after a short delay. Increases accuracy.
perks.name: Explosive Head

perks.description: Precision kills create an elemental damage explosion.
perks.name: Dragonfly

perks.description: Each final blow increases charge/draw speed.
perks.name: Successful Warm-Up

perks.description: This weapon adapts its damage output and effectiveness against energy shields that don't match the weapon's damage type.
perks.name: Adaptive Munitions

perks.description: Each final blow increases charge/draw speed for an improved duration.
perks.name: Successful Warm-Up

perks.description: This weapon adapts its damage output to be more effective against energy shields that don't match its damage type. Improves damage increase.
perks.name: Adaptive Munitions

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon grant increased Resilience and additional damage resistance from combatants.
perks.name: Land Tank
